General.Name: Shanghai Waigaoqiao Free Trade Zone Group Co Ltd B
General.Description: Shanghai Waigaoqiao Free Trade Zone Group Co., Ltd. engages in the trade and logistic, and real estate development business in China. It is also involved in the investment, operation, and management of logistics parks; and development of bonded warehousing. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Waigaoqiao Free Trade Zone Development Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shanghai Waigaoqiao Free Trade Zone Group Co., Ltd. in September 2015. Shanghai Waigaoqiao Free Trade Zone Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is based in Shanghai, China.
